text: Franchino Baresi (; born 8 May 1960) is an Italian football youth team coach and a former player and manager. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Coppa Italia Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals AC Milan 1977–78 Serie A 1 0 2 0 – – 3 0 1978–79 Serie A 30 0 4 0 6 0 – 40 0 1979–80 Serie A 28 0 6 0 1 0 – 35 0 1980–81 Serie B 31 0 4 1 0 0 – 35 1 1981–82 Serie A 18 2 4 0 – 3 2 25 4 1982–83 Serie B 30 4 9 2 – – 39 6 1983–84 Serie A 21 3 9 2 – – 30 5 1984–85 Serie A 26 0 10 0 – – 36 0 1985–86 Serie A 20 0 4 0 3 0 3 0 30 0 1986–87 Serie A 29 2 6 3 – – 35 5 1987–88 Serie A 27 1 6 0 3 0 – 36 1 1988–89 Serie A 33 2 8 2 8 0 1 0 50 4 1989–90 Serie A 30 1 7 4 8 0 1 0 46 5 1990–91 Serie A 31 0 1 0 5 0 1 0 38 0 1991–92 Serie A 33 0 6 1 – – 39 1 1992–93 Serie A 29 0 7 0 8 0 1 0 45 0 1993–94 Serie A 31 0 0 0 11 0 2 0 44 0 1994–95 Serie A 28 0 0 0 13 0 2 0 43 0 1995–96 Serie A 30 1 3 0 7 0 – 40 1 1996–97 Serie A 26 0 1 0 2 0 1 0 30 1 Career total 532 16 97 15 75 0 15 2 719 33 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Italy 1982 1 0 1983 3 0 1984 5 0 1985 0 0 1986 3 0 1987 5 0 1988 11 1 1989 10 0 1990 11 0 1991 9 0 1992 7 0 1993 7 0 1994 9 0 Total 81 1 :Scores and results list Italy's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Baresi goal.
